WorkItem.Description:
When I compile WPFToolkit, I get following error message for Controls.DataVisualization.Toolkit.Design:
The type 'Microsoft.Windows.Design.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder' exists in both 'c:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Expression\Blend 3\Microsoft.Windows.Design.Extensibility\Microsoft.Windows.Design.Extensibility.dll' and 'c:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\PublicAssemblies\Microsoft.Windows.Design.dll'
WorkItem.Summary: AttributeTableBuilder exists in two referenced assemblies

Comments.Message: I get the same error with the latest source code (40156).
Same error with the February 2010 release.

Same for me with the Feb 2010 release.  I found this post (http://wpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=72582) and deleting and readding the projects didn't work, but once I removed all of the ones with duplicate references, it did compile okay.  I assume I'm going to run into issues if I actually try to use this DLL.
why nobody puts there solutions here?
